text: The Somali Regional State is a region in Ethiopia. The capital city is Jijiga. ==Administrative zones== Like other Regions in Ethiopia, Somali Region is divided into eleven administrative zones and Six Special administrative zones: * Sitti Zone * Faafan Zone * Jarar zone * Nogob Zone * Erar Zone * Doollo Zone * qoraxay Zone * Shabeelle Zone * Afdheer Zone * Libaan Zone * Harawo Special Zone (special zone) * Tog Wajaale Special Zone (special zone) * Goday Special Zone (special zone) * Gabri bax Special Zone (special zone) * dhagaxbuur Special Zone (special zone) * Dhawa Special Zone (special zone) The zones are divided into districts. ==References== Category:Regions of Ethiopia
title: Somali Region
